name: FlaschBier
overview: A Boulder Dash clone that was known for it's difficulty. Later it would come to be known that the released 1985 version was not the full and complete game the created originally intended and a full version was released including all 45 levels fully selectable, a new level editor and several little changes in code to make it all work a bit better in 2022. Unlike the standard versions of BD this one does not allow pushing even single stones.
